comment.body: there are already too much youtube-like plateform on ZeroNet (at some point I had 10 youtube-like zites in my list ><) to the point that's hard to choose which one to use to upload a video (and all of them have this porn problem)... Forking is not the solution because it will induce more splitting user base and less and less video variety on each plateform... That's the problem right now with KopyKate: 2/3 chinese accounts uploading porn long time ago and no new non porn video to make more views and remove them from the frontpage... The real solution is to aggregate all those plateform so there is more content and statistically more chance to not have porn on frontpage...
